name: py-dm-tree

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
tree is a library for working with nested data structures. In a way,
tree generalizes the builtin map() function which only supports flat
sequences, and allows to apply a function to each leaf preserving the
overall structure.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: bazel
dependencies.description:
Bazel is an open-source build and test tool similar to Make, Maven, and
Gradle. It uses a human-readable, high-level build language. Bazel
supports projects in multiple languages and builds outputs for multiple
platforms. Bazel supports large codebases across multiple repositories,
and large numbers of users.

dependent_to.name: py-alphafold
dependent_to.description:
AlphaFold is an AI system developed by DeepMind that predicts a
protein's 3D structure from its amino acid sequence. It regularly
achieves accuracy competitive with experiment.

dependent_to.name: py-deephyper
dependent_to.description:
Scalable asynchronous neural architecture and hyperparameter search for
deep neural networks.

dependent_to.name: py-fastfold
dependent_to.description:
Optimizing Protein Structure Prediction Model Training and Inference on
GPU Clusters.

dependent_to.name: py-tensorflow-probability
dependent_to.description:
TensorFlow Probability (TFP) is a Python library built on TensorFlow
that makes it easy to combine probabilistic models and deep learning on
modern hardware (TPU, GPU). It's for data scientists, statisticians, ML
researchers, and practitioners who want to encode domain knowledge to
understand data and make predictions.

dependent_to.name: py-chex
dependent_to.description: Chex is a library of utilities for helping to write reliable JAX code.
